snippet: Cambridge, Mass., celebrates “Shred Day,” as residents show up at Central Square with some 2,000 pounds of paper in the first hour.
abstract: Cambridge, Mass, celebrates the city-sponsored Shred Day, a free event in which residents can bring their important paper documents to a mobile shredding truck at Central Square; such 'shred-a-thons' have become popular around the country as concerns have risen about identity theft.
lead_paragraph: Cambridge, Mass., celebrates “Shred Day,” as residents show up at Central Square with some 2,000 pounds of paper in the first hour.

headline.main: Joy and Therapy in Making Confetti
headline.print_headline: Joy and Therapy in Making Confetti
